cookieBanner.missatge: We and our partners store and/or access information on your device through cookies, and process personal data, such as unique identifiers and standard information to gather audience insights. Alternatively, you can click to refuse consent.

homepage.titleSeo: Elliot Fernandez - Web Developer and Historian
homepage.descripcioSeo: The website of Web Developer and Historian Elliot Fernandez, where you can view his works and history articles.
homepage.webTitle: ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I'm Elliot Fernandez, front-end web developer and historian.
homepage.historiaOberta: Open History is an independent publishing project that offers its readers free access to history articles on many different courses. You can now read the history articles on this website.

article.articleNoDisponible: Sorry, but this content is not available at the moment.

AuthorBox.descripcioAutor: I was born in 1987 in Terrassa (Barcelona). In 2009, I graduated in Modern and Contemporary History from the Autonomous University of Barcelona, and in 2011, I completed a Master's in World History at Pompeu Fabra University. Professionally, I am a web developer specializing in Front-end technologies. Since 2017, I have been working on web projects as a freelancer at HispanTIC.
